001package imagingbook.lib.pdf;
002
003import java.awt.Desktop;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileOutputStream;
006
007import com.lowagie.text.Chunk;
008import com.lowagie.text.Document;
009import com.lowagie.text.Font;
010import com.lowagie.text.PageSize;
011import com.lowagie.text.Phrase;
012import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfWriter;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015
016/**
017 * Creates a 1-page PDF with samples of all 14 standard Type1 fonts embedded.
018 * 
019 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1775008/embed-font-into-pdf-file-by-using-itext
020 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2019607/how-to-embed-helvetica-font-in-pdf-using-itext?rq=1
021 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34328953/embedding-helvetica-neue-deskinterface-font-with-itext
022 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32457258/pdf-partial-font-embedding-with-itext
023 * 
024 * AWT/PDF fonts issue: 
025 * https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17667615/how-can-itext-embed-font-used-by-jfreechart-for-chart-title-and-labels?rq=1
026 * 
027 * 
028 * TODO: check if change to https://pdfbox.apache.org/ = https://github.com/apache/pdfbox
029 * @author WB
030 *
031 */
032public class Type1FontDemo {
033        
034        static float fontSize = 14f;
035
036        public static void main(String[] args) {
037                
038//              File file = new File("D:/tmp/Type1FontDemo.pdf");
039                File file = new File(System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir") + "/Type1FontDemo.pdf");
040        System.out.println("writting to " + file.getAbsolutePath());
041
042            // creation of the document with a certain size and certain margins
043            // may want to use PageSize.LETTER instead
044            Document document = new Document(PageSize.A4, 50, 50, 50, 50);
045            try {
046                FileOutputStream strm = new FileOutputStream(file);
047                PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.getInstance(document, strm);
048
049                document.open();
050                Phrase phrase = new Phrase();
051
052                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier", new Font(Type1CoreFont.Courier.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
053                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
054                
055                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier-Bold", new Font(Type1CoreFont.CourierBold.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
056                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
057                
058                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier-Oblique", new Font(Type1CoreFont.CourierOblique.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
059                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
060                
061                phrase.add(new Chunk("Courier-BoldOblique", new Font(Type1CoreFont.CourierBoldOblique.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
062                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
063                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE); 
064
065                phrase.add(new Chunk("Helvetica", new Font(Type1CoreFont.Helvetica.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
066                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
067                
068                phrase.add(new Chunk("Helvetica-Bold", new Font(Type1CoreFont.HelveticaBold.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
069                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
070                
071                phrase.add(new Chunk("Helvetica-BoldOblique", new Font(Type1CoreFont.HelveticaBoldOblique.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
072                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
073                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
074                
075                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesRoman.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
076                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
077                
078                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times-Bold", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesBold.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
079                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
080
081                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times-BoldItalic", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesBoldItalic.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
082                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);            
083
084                phrase.add(new Chunk("Times-Italic", new Font(Type1CoreFont.TimesItalic.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
085                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
086                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);
087
088                
089                phrase.add(new Chunk("Symbol", new Font(Type1CoreFont.Symbol.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
090                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE); 
091                
092                phrase.add(new Chunk("ZapfDingbats", new Font(Type1CoreFont.ZapfDingbats.getBaseFont(), fontSize)));
093                phrase.add(Chunk.NEWLINE);  
094
095                document.add(phrase);
096
097                document.close();
098                writer.close();
099                strm.close();
100                System.out.println("file written to " + file.getAbsolutePath());
101                
102
103            } catch (Exception ex) {
104                System.err.println(ex.getMessage());
105            }
106            
107            // try to open the PDF:
108            Desktop dt = Desktop.getDesktop();
109                try {
110                        dt.open(file);
111                } catch (Exception ex) {
112                        IJ.error("Could not open PDF file " + file.getAbsolutePath());
113                }
114        }
115            
116}
